phrases.text: Cùng nhau múa xung quanh vòng
phrases.english: together with each other dance clash around circle/round

culturalContext.description: As the opening phrase, this establishes the song's emotional tone and invites audience engagement. This phrase repeats multiple times throughout the song, serving as a structural anchor and allowing audience participation.
facts: Northern Vietnamese music is characterized by refined, softer dynamics, high tessitura
Opening phrases in Vietnamese folk songs often use vocatives (ơi, này) to grab attention before the narrative begins
Vietnamese musical phrases typically follow speech tone patterns - rising tones matched with rising pitches
The pentatonic scale (5-note) is fundamental to Vietnamese folk music, avoiding Western semitone tensions
culturalContext.musicalContext: The 6-syllable structure (song lục) balances melody with text, common in Southern traditions. As the opening phrase, it establishes the tonal center and introduces the melodic motif that will be varied throughout. The repetition of this refrain creates hypnotic effect and marks structural divisions between narrative verses.

phrases.english: together with each other dance together with happy

culturalContext.description: This narrative phrase contributes to the song's narrative structure and emotional arc, typical of Northern folk traditions.
facts: Northern Vietnamese music is characterized by refined, softer dynamics, high tessitura
Vietnamese musical phrases typically follow speech tone patterns - rising tones matched with rising pitches
The pentatonic scale (5-note) is fundamental to Vietnamese folk music, avoiding Western semitone tensions
Đàn tranh (16-string zither) arrangements of folk songs are 20th century innovations - originals were vocal
culturalContext.musicalContext: The 5-syllable structure (lục bát's "lục" variant) adds weight and conclusion, often used at phrase endings.

phrases.text: Cùng nhau múa xung quanh vòng

culturalContext.description: This phrase repeats multiple times throughout the song, serving as a structural anchor and allowing audience participation.
facts: Northern Vietnamese music is characterized by refined, softer dynamics, high tessitura

phrases.english: happy together with happy dance all/even

culturalContext.description: As the closing phrase, this provides resolution and often returns to opening themes for circular structure.
facts: Northern Vietnamese music is characterized by refined, softer dynamics, high tessitura
Vietnamese musical phrases typically follow speech tone patterns - rising tones matched with rising pitches
The pentatonic scale (5-note) is fundamental to Vietnamese folk music, avoiding Western semitone tensions
Đàn tranh (16-string zither) arrangements of folk songs are 20th century innovations - originals were vocal
culturalContext.musicalContext: The 5-syllable structure (lục bát's "lục" variant) adds weight and conclusion, often used at phrase endings. As the closing phrase, it typically returns to the tonic note and may quote the opening melody for circular structure.
